item.title: Sunken drain covers and potholes along most of Moorgate/City Road, 9th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, City Road, Finsbury, Greater London

item.title: Under big tree outside 33 Kenilworth Rd, 9th December
item.description:
Another large dump of boxes, packaging and rubbish - all clearly labelled with name and address (33A Kenilworth Rd). Items dumped with the same name and address attached just last week at same site (and immediately outside this address!). Why does Brent Council not act when the perpetrators can clearly be identified?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Neighbour’s Overgrown and Unmaintained Garden Causing Nuisance, 9th December
item.description:
I am reporting an issue concerning a neighbouring property located 9 Benenden Green Bromley BR2 9DJ. Both properties are privately owned, but the garden at this address has not been maintained for a long period of time. The garden is heavily overgrown and is now causing problems for surrounding residents. The lack of maintenance has resulted in: • Overgrowth spreading toward my property • Increased presence of pests/wildlife • An unpleasant and neglected appearance affecting the local area I have attempted to resolve this informally, but the situation has not improved. I am requesting that the council investigate whether this garden now falls under nuisance or environmental health concerns, such as accumulation, vermin, or detrimental impact on the neighbourhood. if nothing can be done please can i be contacted via phone or letter to be notified of outcome
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Benenden Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
